name: Antalya Daily Rafting Tour
description: Is the weather in Antalya very hot? Are you bored of spending all your day lying on the beach? Do you need some action during your holiday in Antalya? How about spending one day full of action, entertainment and joy in the coolest river of Antalya? How about Rafting? If all your answers are "YES!" , you are kindly welcome to our Daily rafting tours!
